TopicTitle: I deleted the NASA mission pack

Articles.Content:
I accidently removed the squad and nasa "mods" when pruning for 1.0.

Steam restored the squad one, but NASA not.

Is NASA a part of Squad now or can i download it elsewhere?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T03:03:08Z" title="04/29/2015 03:03  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Claw**
yes nasa is integrated into squad.. no worries there.
Exactly as Beduino said, the Squad and NASA directories were merged with the release.
